main.bio: An efficient computer Science and Engineering major pursuing B.Tech in aiming to leverage proven communication, critical thinking and technical skills. I can be relied upon to help your company achieve it's goals.

work.title: Shubham matrimony
work.description: With a team of 5, we successfully made a static website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It includes home page, login, register, bride and groom category page, and payment page.

work.title: Labelstyles
work.description: This is an ecommerce website made with ReactJs based on traditional and customized clothing apparels for women. I have contribiuted for the front end, I have worked for the homepage and cart page.

certifications.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
